system.description:
When you pull your punches while @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.moves.Item.RbWTLi81e6IZ9vH4]{Directly Engage a Threat}, you can roll + Savior instead of + Danger.

If you do, you cannot choose to impress, surprise, or frighten your foe.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
Trade blows and pick one.

  • resist or avoid their blows
  • take something from them
  • create an opportunity for your allies
  • impress, surprise, or frighten the opposition

success.label: Success!
success.value:
Trade blows and pick two.

  • resist or avoid their blows
  • take something from them
  • create an opportunity for your allies
  • impress, surprise, or frighten the opposition

system.choices:
• @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.t9kFvEp4eNYMCUkC]{Resisting or avoiding their blows}

  • @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.VTyTLEzt5Zbx3JM4]{Taking something from them}

  • @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.AGsdZxeDIixx5ulh]{Creating an opportunity for your allies}

  • @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.3e3Dyp1IAnqrGwNj]{Impress, surprise, or frighten the opposition}
